page.title: 17G.W.R.150 SCHOOL E.SWINDON
page.content: School Work:- The{art work}in all the schools has been superb, with huge models of {"Morning Star", "Iron Duke"}and other famous broad gauge locomotives, models of the{Great Eastern, Great Western and{Great Britain,}attempts to build a model of the{Clifton Suspension Bridge and even the{Box Tunnel. There have been paintings, sketchings, collages, photographs, rubbings, maps..... Costumes have been excellent and many plays about these events have been incorporated in school {assemblies. A major source of information came from a{Quest computer program}with all the information about the people who lived in the{Railway Village in 1845, taken from the{National Census}of 1845.
